text:
An excellent gallery now showing photographs of birds taken islandwide by volunteers.  Till end Oct 2024. Very impressive. Here are some photos taken with my phone camera -which doesn't do real justice to the beautiful photos - please go see them.

Most of all, it offers airconed respite from the sorching heat! Thanks to CDL, a  real estate. developer.
A small but informative gallery. The information was substantial and a little too much to read through properly but it was still good. Really liked the penguin photos at the end!
Really good and insightful. Visited with the kid and she liked it. Global warming, its impact, what Singapore has done so far to slow it and many more.

Near to the gardens gate there is a small exhibit area by CDL that shows exhibits and education on ocean crisis and marine preservations. Aircon was full blast so itâ€™s a great contrast to the hot humid weather while you read through the exhibits.

Museum to learn about environment sustainability

Takes about 15 mins to read
